title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.3 - Notification to firms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.3 - Notification to firms

State Regulations

Within 30 days of the public announcement of the Federal SBIR
Phase I award winners by a Federal agency, the foundation shall contact all
award recipients whose principal place of business is in New York State, as
shown on the Federal agency award announcement, to provide each firm with
information regarding the State research contract program and the requirements
a firm must meet to qualify for a State research contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5905.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
